page.title: 13Development Plan,Evesham.
page.content: {HOUSING:}950 more houses are to be built by 1991.They will be mostly between Four Pools and the Bypass. {SHOPPING:}A few more shops will be built at Four Pools, but the council want to keep most shops in the town centre. {INDUSTRY:}There will be a few new factories at Four Pools and on the Worcester Road railway sidings land. {ROADS:}In Evesham we shall have a road called the Bypass. It should save many traffic jams. {VEHICLE PARKING:}There will be four new car parks on the edge of the town. Lorries and coaches will have special parking areas. {LEISURE:}There will be new playing fields,a sportshall & riverside walks. {CONSERVATION:}new buildings will have to be of similar size to old buildings and made of the same materials.
